name: Billy's Quest (Jules Fritz | LPP)
description:
Hi ! This is my first game ever made and i'm proud of what I did so here it is ! I've made everythings by my hands from scripts to assets (except for the bull (don't judge me i'm not an artist)).  Enjoy it and give me some feedbacks please ! 

Oh ! I forgot, the game is in french because I'm french ! Soz !!!
